name: Faenox Demo
description:
Games runs best at a 1920x1080 Resolution.

Jump into a 2D Pixel Art Style Metroidvania video game inspired by the Shantae series and Hollow Knight. This is Faenox, explore a dungeon to find unique abilities and use them to help make your way down to the dungeon’s exit. Fight your way through four different types of enemies as you try to find the exit, but before you can leave you will have to face off against the boss of the dungeon.
